user_question.text: I am unhappy in my current job. Any ideas in what direction I could go instead?

mate_response.text:
Of course! Since you mentioned that you have a background in marketing and enjoy storytelling, we could look for roles that leverage those skills.

To get a better sense of direction, could you tell me:
1. What aspects of your previous jobs did you find most fulfilling?
mate_response.context: AI response to career change question

user_question.text: What events are happening the coming days?

mate_response.text: There are some exciting events going on the coming days! Both to help you learn for a better career and to socialize more.

book_club.text: Book Lovers' Social: An Evening of Reading and Discussion

user_question.text: What is the next available cardiologist appointment, that doesn't collide with my calendar?

mate_initial.text: Let me quickly check your calendar and search for available doctor appointments. I will come back to you in a minute.
mate_initial.context: Initial AI response about checking calendar

mate_response.text: The best appointment I could find is tomorrow at 9:00. Doesn't collide with your product launch meeting later that day.

an_error_occured.text: Sorry, something went wrong while I was trying to process your message. This can happen for many reasons. But be assured, the OpenMates team will be informed and will fix it as soon as possible. But if you want to help, let us know on Discord what you were doing when this error happened (but keep in mind that you should not include personal/sensitive details).

section_title.context: Title of the design guidelines section

text.text: In today's turbulent world, where profit-at-all-costs companies frequently misuse user data, where companies with inadequate security measures are regularly hacked and their users' data falls into the hands of bad actors, and where we cannot always rely on governments to protect the rights and well-being of their citizens, making decisions to safeguard your privacy has become increasingly essential.

subtext.text:
Therefore,
OpenMates is designed
with a focus on privacy.

headline_1.context: Used in 'Maximum good, not maximum greed.'

headline_2.context: Used in 'Maximum good, not maximum greed.'

text.text: Over recent years, profit-at-all-cost tech monopolies have over and over again prioritized their greed instead of the interests of their users and our planet, ignoring the negative consequences and destruction caused by those decisions. We can't just continue like that.
text.context: Main text explaining maximum good philosophy

subtext.text:
Therefore,
OpenMates is designed
with a focus on maximizing the positive impact of AI.

description.text: OpenMates is a community effort. From software developers, to designers, to users who are just excited about how AI can help them at work and in everyday life - everyone can contribute in valuable ways.

heading.context: Section heading for data protection overview

overview.text: This privacy policy explains what happens to your data when you use our website and web application. We are committed to transparency regarding data handling and work with various service providers to deliver our services.

website_vs_webapp.text: Please note: Our website uses only Vercel for hosting. All other services mentioned below are used exclusively by users of our web application (https://openmates.org).
website_vs_webapp.context: Clarification about website vs web app services

heading.context: Section heading for Vercel hosting information

description.text: Our website and web app (static content) is hosted using Vercel's platform (US company). When you visit our website or web app, your request is processed by Vercel's servers. Vercel may collect technical information including IP addresses, browser type and version, basic access logs, performance data, and other standard server logs.
description.context: Description of Vercel hosting and data collection

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Vercel's privacy policy

heading.context: Section heading for web application services

intro.text: The following services are used exclusively for our web application (https://openmates.org):

heading.context: Section heading for Hetzner hosting information

description.text: Our web application's backend services, databases, and file storage are hosted on Hetzner's infrastructure (EU company, EU servers). This includes web app backend hosting, all backend processing, database hosting, and S3 file hosting.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Hetzner's privacy policy

description.text: We use IP-API (EU company) for IP address geolocation to determine approximate geographic location for security and localization purposes in the web application.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for IP-API's privacy policy

description.text: We use Mailjet (EU company) for email sending, including transactional emails such as account verification, security alerts, and notifications for web application users.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Mailjet's privacy policy

description.text: We use Sightengine (EU company) for moderation of uploaded images and videos in the web application to ensure content compliance with our terms of service.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Sightengine's privacy policy

description.text: We use Stripe (US company) for payment processing for purchases made in the web application, ensuring secure handling of payment information.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Stripe's privacy policy

heading.context: Section heading for Mistral AI service

description.text: We use Mistral AI (EU company) for LLM requests processing in the web application to process some of your chat requests and provide AI-powered responses.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Mistral AI's privacy policy

description.text: We use AWS Bedrock (US company, EU servers) to access Anthropic's Claude models for LLM requests processing in the web application, handling some of your chat requests and providing AI-powered responses.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for AWS's privacy policy

description.text: We use OpenRouter (US company, US servers) as a gateway to access multiple large-language-model providers. When your chat request is routed via OpenRouter, it may process your prompts and responses to deliver the requested AI output.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for OpenRouter's privacy policy

description.text: We may use Cerebras (US company, US servers) as a language model provider through OpenRouter to process some of your chat requests and provide AI-generated responses.

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Cerebras' privacy policy

intro.text: We implement various security measures to protect your account and data in the web application:

purpose.text: To enhance account security, prevent fraudulent access, and distinguish between new and recognized devices during login and session validation, we collect User-Agent strings (browser, OS, device type information) and IP addresses (used temporarily to derive approximate geo-location like country/city, then discarded from the device record).
purpose.context: Purpose and data collection for device fingerprinting

storage.text: A unique, stable hash is generated based on a combination of the collected signals. This hash is the only value stored in the device record. Browser/OS type and derived country code may be used transiently for risk assessment and notifications but are not stored with the device record. Raw IP addresses are NOT stored as part of the device record itself.
storage.context: How device fingerprinting data is stored

ip_logging.text: For security monitoring and abuse prevention, IP addresses associated with failed login attempts (invalid password or 2FA code) may be logged with limited retention. In addition, certain security/compliance events (e.g., successful backup-code logins) may be logged with IP for audit purposes. IP addresses are also used for rate limiting login attempts.

heading.text: 5. Data Categories We Collect and Process

intro.text: We collect and process the following categories of data to operate and secure our services:

account.text: Account: Email address, username/display name, profile image, locale, and security settings (e.g., 2FA enabled). Passwords are stored as salted hashes.

usage.text: Usage: Server logs, event timestamps, feature usage, error logs, and device recognition identifiers (hashed). IP addresses may be temporarily processed for security and rate limiting.

content.text: Content: Chat messages, prompts, attachments, and uploaded images/videos necessary to deliver the service (subject to moderation where applicable).

payments.text: Payments: Payment method tokens, transaction IDs, billing address and VAT information as required for invoicing (processed primarily by Stripe). We do not store full card numbers.

account.text: Account data: Retained until account deletion and completion of related legal obligations.

usage_and_logs.text: Usage and logs: Operational logs retained up to 12 months; IPs tied to failed logins up to 30 days for security.

device_fingerprints.text: Device fingerprints: Retained until account deletion or manual removal from account settings (when available).

content.text: Content: Retained until the user deletes the content or closes the account, subject to backup cycles.

payments_and_invoices.text: Payments and invoices: Retained up to 10 years where required by tax/commercial law.

contract.text: Contract: Processing necessary to perform our contract with you or to take steps at your request prior to entering into a contract (e.g., account creation, delivering web app features).

consent.text: Consent: Processing based on your consent, where applicable (e.g., optional communications, certain analytics or marketing where used). You can withdraw consent at any time.

legitimate_interests.text: Legitimate interests: Processing necessary for our legitimate interests, such as service security, fraud prevention, abuse detection, and improving the service, provided these interests are not overridden by your rights and interests.

legal_obligation.text: Legal obligation: Processing necessary to comply with legal obligations (e.g., tax and accounting requirements for invoices and transaction records).

intro.text: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have certain rights over your personal data. The following summarizes key rights under GDPR and CCPA/CPRA and how to exercise them:

erasure.text: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

exercise.text: To exercise your GDPR rights, contact us at contact@openmates.org or via the Imprint. We may need to verify your identity before fulfilling your request.

right_to_opt_out_of_sale_or_sharing.text: Right to opt-out of sale or sharing

exercise.text: California residents can exercise CCPA/CPRA rights by contacting us at contact@openmates.org. We do not sell personal information.

description.text: If you choose to join our Discord community through links provided on this website, please note that Discord will collect and process your data according to their privacy policy. This includes account information, usage data, communication content, and other information as outlined in Discord's privacy policy.

admin_access.text: As Discord server administrators, we have access to all public communications, member lists, and other information shared within our Discord community. However, this information is hosted and primarily processed by Discord. We do not extract, store, or process this data outside of Discord's platform. For more information about how Discord handles your data, please review Discord's Privacy Policy.
admin_access.context: Description of admin access to Discord data

privacy_policy_link.context: Link text for Discord's privacy policy

postal.text: Postal address: See Legal Notice (Imprint) for the current registered address.

controller.text: Controller: OpenMates (see Imprint for legal representative details).

title.context: Title of terms and conditions page

last_updated_date.context: Actual last update date of terms - update this when the terms change

description.text: By accessing and using the OpenMates website ("Website"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the Website.

OpenMates is an open-source AI agents platform available under AGPL-3.0 license. We provide a cloud-hosted service at openmates.org, a developer API for integration, and a CLI tool. The software can also be self-hosted - see our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/glowingkitty/OpenMates) and [documentation](https://docs.openmates.org) for details.

The OpenMates name and logo are trademarks of the service operator (see Imprint). The OpenMates software is available under AGPL-3.0 license - see our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/glowingkitty/OpenMates) for full license terms. We do not claim copyright on any AI-generated responses. You retain ownership of your prompts and data. We never train AI models on user data.

You are granted permission to use OpenMates' cloud-hosted web application, developer API and CLI tool for any lawful purpose, including commercial purposes. This applies to the use of our service, not to the website content itself. The OpenMates software is available under AGPL-3.0 license - you may use, modify, and distribute it according to the license terms. See our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/glowingkitty/OpenMates) for the full license.
You may not use OpenMates for:

misinformation.text: Generating or distributing misinformation, disinformation, or false content intended to deceive

scams.text: Fraud, scams, phishing, or any illegal or deceptive practices

illegal.text: Any illegal activities or purposes prohibited by applicable law

heading.context: Section heading for AI accuracy disclaimer

description.text: OpenMates uses AI models that may generate inaccurate, incomplete, or misleading information. While we strive to minimize errors, AI responses can contain factual inaccuracies, outdated information, or hallucinations. You are responsible for verifying any critical information, especially for high-stakes situations such as medical, legal, financial, or safety-critical decisions. AI-generated responses do not replace professional advice from qualified experts such as lawyers, doctors, or financial advisors.

heading.context: Subsection heading for data sharing warning

text.text: To process your requests, OpenMates sends your prompts and data to third-party AI service providers (as detailed in our Privacy Policy). While these providers claim they do not train models on user data, we cannot independently verify these claims. Therefore, we strongly advise against submitting highly sensitive personal, financial, medical, or confidential information to OpenMates. Please consider potential consequences before sharing sensitive data. We are committed to privacy and have designed OpenMates with privacy in mind, but we cannot guarantee how external partners process your data.
text.context: Data sharing warning with AI partners

description.text: OpenMates uses a credit-based payment system. You purchase credit packs which are consumed when using AI services. Credits do not expire and remain in your account until used. Payment processing is handled by Stripe - see our Privacy Policy for details about payment data handling.

refund.text: Refund Policy: You may request a refund for unused credits within 14 days after purchase. Your right of withdrawal expires once credits are used. See our signup process for the full refund consent details.

description.text: The materials and information on this Website and the OpenMates service are provided 'as is' and without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any information provided by OpenMates. AI-generated responses may contain errors, inaccuracies, or outdated information. Any reliance you place on such information is strictly at your own risk.
To the fullest extent permitted by law, the website owner shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages arising out of or in any way connected with:

website_use.text: The use or inability to use the OpenMates service

ai_responses.text: Incorrect, inaccurate, or harmful AI-generated responses or content

information.text: The information provided by OpenMates, including AI-generated content

technical.text: Any technical issues, interruptions, or service unavailability

data_loss.text: Loss of data due to system failures, despite our backup measures

explanation.text: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Federal Republic of Germany. For details about the responsible jurisdiction and contact information, please refer to our Imprint.

heading.context: Section heading for encryption key warnings

description.text: OpenMates uses client-side encryption to protect your long-term stored chats. Chats are encrypted with keys generated on your device that only your devices can decrypt - our servers cannot decrypt your stored chats. However, when you send messages for AI processing, decrypted content is temporarily sent to our servers for inference. Only chats saved for long-term storage are encrypted. If you lose access to all your login methods (password, passkey, recovery key, security key), we cannot restore access to your encrypted data. This is a security feature - we cannot decrypt your stored chats without your encryption keys. Please keep your login credentials and recovery keys secure and backed up.

We aim to provide reliable and fast access to OpenMates. However, we do not guarantee specific uptime percentages. Our focus is on scaling sustainably to serve all users effectively. The service may experience interruptions for maintenance, updates, or due to technical issues beyond our control.

description.text: Your AI teammates for learning, thinking, and growing together
description.context: Description of welcome demo chat for SEO

message.text:
# Welcome to OpenMates! ๐

I'm your AI teammate - here to help you learn, solve problems, and think through challenges. I'm designed to guide you with questions rather than just give answers, helping you build real understanding. Like all AI, I can make mistakes, but I'm specifically designed to minimize errors, admit uncertainty, and encourage you to verify important information from multiple sources.

## What you can do:

- **Learn topics deeply** - "Teach me about quantum computing" or "Explain neural networks"
- **Get coding help** - "Debug this code" or "Explain how async/await works"
- **Think through decisions** - "Help me evaluate career options" or "What am I missing?"
- **Explore ideas** - "Brainstorm startup ideas in healthcare" or "Design a user survey"
- **Understand complex topics** - "Explain the 2008 financial crisis" or "How does CRISPR work?"
- **Plan and organize** - "Help me structure my research paper" or "Create a learning roadmap"

## Getting Started

**Start a new chat** - Click the "New Chat" button in the top left of this chat

**Sign up for full access** - Open the settings menu (button in the top right) to create an account

**Learn more** - Explore [What makes OpenMates different?](/chat/what-makes-different)

---

*Different specialized AI "Mates" will automatically help based on your topic - from Sophia (software development) to Lisa (life coaching) to Scarlett (science) and more!*

follow_up_2.text: How do the different Mates work?

title.context: Title of what makes different demo chat

description.text: Discover specialized Mates, zero-knowledge encryption, multiple drafts, and performance-optimized UX
description.context: Description of what makes different demo chat for SEO

user_question.text: What makes OpenMates different from other AI assistants?
user_question.context: User's question in what makes different chat

answer.text:
Great question! OpenMates stands out in several key ways:

## ๐ค Optimized Mates for Every Task

Instead of one generic assistant, OpenMates automatically routes your request to specialized "Mates" optimized for different domains:

- **Sophia** - Software development expert (coding, architecture, debugging)
- **Burton** - Business development (strategy, market analysis, growth)
- **Melvin** - Medical & health information (with proper disclaimers)
- **Leon** - Legal topics (educational, not legal advice)
- **Makani** - Maker & rapid prototyping (DIY, 3D printing, electronics)
- **Mark** - Marketing & sales strategies
- **Finn** - Finance & investment information
- **Denise** - Design (UI/UX, graphic design, aesthetics)
- **Plus more** - History, Science, Life Coaching, Cooking, and more!

Each Mate has a specialized system prompt and expertise area, ensuring you get the most relevant and capable assistant for your specific task.

## ๐ Multiple Drafts Support

OpenMates supports **multiple conversation drafts** - allowing you to:
- Explore different approaches to the same problem
- Compare various solutions side-by-side
- Keep alternative conversation paths without losing context
- Work on multiple versions of creative content

This encourages experimentation and iterative thinking.

## ๐ Zero-Knowledge Encryption

Your privacy is architecturally guaranteed:
- **Zero-knowledge storage** - The server cannot decrypt your stored chats by itself
- **Device-controlled processing** - Your device must decrypt and send chats to the server for AI processing
- **Encrypted at rest** - Stored messages are encrypted and require your device's participation to decrypt
- **Transparent security** - Open source code you can audit

**Important to understand:** While your chats are encrypted when stored, they must be decrypted during AI processing. This means the server can read messages while processing them, but cannot access stored messages without your device's active participation.

This is more secure than services that can access all your data anytime, but less private than fully local AI processing.

## โก Performance-Optimized UX

Built for real-world usability:
- **Fast, responsive interface** - Optimized for performance at every level
- **Intuitive design** - Clean, simple UI that gets out of your way
- **Accessible by default** - Screen reader support, keyboard navigation
- **Progressive enhancement** - Works on all devices and connection speeds

The design philosophy: Make AI assistance feel natural and effortless.

## ๐ฑ Coming Soon: Apps & Skills

We're actively developing:
- **Web Search** - Real-time information from the internet
- **Code Execution** - Run and test code safely
- **File Analysis** - Work with documents and data
- **And more tools** to make your AI teammate even more capable!

---

**In short:** OpenMates gives you specialized expertise, true privacy, flexible thinking, and a UX designed for humans - not just impressive demos.

Want to dive deeper into any of these features?
